sub_topic: Determining the treewidth of a graph.
message_1:
Consider the following graph G with 7 vertices and 9 edges. Determine the treewidth of G.

```
   (1)--(2)--(3)
    |   / \   |
    |  /   \  |
   (4)      (5)
   / \      / \
  /   \    /   \
(6)   (7) (8)  (9)
```

What is the treewidth of graph G?
